metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37218 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise Raft RPC layer allows non-serveragents with a valid certificate signed by the same CA to access server-onlyfunctionality, enabling privilege escalation. Fixed in 1.0.10 and 1.1.4.

criterions.comment: nomad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
